```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(wesanderson)
library(knitr)

```
```{r}
eq1 <- function(x){
  3 * x^2 + 4
  
}

my_data_range <- data.frame(x = c(1, 100))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = my_data_range, aes(x = x)) +
  geom_function(fun = eq1)


```

```{r}
ct <- function(t){
  t^3
}

my_data <- data.frame(t = c(-5, 5))

ggplot(my_data, aes(x = t)) +
  geom_function(fun = ct)
```
```{r}
dc_dt <- D(expr = expression(t^3), name = "t")
dc_dt

dc_dt_fun <- function(t){
  3 * t^2
  
}
```
```{r}
ggplot(my_data, aes(x = t)) +
  geom_function(fun = ct, color = "purple") +
  geom_function(fun = dc_dt_fun, color = "cyan4")

```
